name: 永远的休息
content: When I met you the stars above
Haunt up battle hold up my love
You are the one the one for me
You know you are my love half
I was I was the one that made it last
The other lotta lovin' out for you
Standin' to move just you and I
When you fell in love this guy was blue
Now tell me the club is not for you
We can do whatever if you like
